definition: (basketball) a player releases the basketball at the high point of a jump
details:
noun
- (basketball) a player releases the basketball at the high point of a jump
= synonyms: jump shot
- a sleeveless dress resembling an apron
= synonyms: pinafore, pinny
- a loose jacket or blouse worn by workmen
- a small connector used to make temporary electrical connections
- a coverall worn by children
- a crocheted or knitted garment covering the upper part of the body
= synonyms: sweater
- an athlete who competes at jumping
= example: an athlete who competes at jumping
- a person who jumps
= example: a person who jumps
